synopsis.text: FBI's bomb disposal expert Lisa Hoshino and her robotic aide Dandy join forces with the unconventional Tokyo police officer Ryotsu to thwart the menacing plans of Benten, a masked bomber targeting the unsightly structures of Shinatora, a ruthless billionaire. As the city grapples with a series of bombings, Ryotsu's true desire lies in the pursuit of a Shogun's lost treasure. With Benten's next target revealed as Shinatora World, a colossal amusement park, Ryotsu and Lisa must set aside their differences and race against time to prevent a catastrophic explosion that could annihilate Tokyo. Will Ryotsu rise to the occasion and save the city, or will Benten's sinister plot prevail?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
